Uses of Class
edu.rit.image.ColorArray

  • Packages that use ColorArray 
    Package Description
    edu.rit.image
    Package edu.rit.image contains classes for creating image files.

    • Uses of ColorArray in edu.rit.image

      Methods in edu.rit.image that return ColorArray 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ColorArray ColorArray.color(int i, Color color)
      Set the given element of this color array to the given color object.
      ColorArray ColorArray.gray(int i, float gray)
      Set the given element of this color array to the given floating point gray value.
      ColorArray ColorArray.gray(int i, int gray)
      Set the given element of this color array to the given integer gray value.
      ColorArray ColorArray.hsb(int i, float hue, float sat, float bri)
      Set the given element of this color array from the given floating point hue, saturation, and brightness components.
      ColorArray ColorImageQueue.remove(int row)
      Remove the pixel data from the given row of this image queue.
      ColorArray ColorArray.rgb(int i, float red, float green, float blue)
      Set the given element of this color array from the given floating point red, green, and blue components.
      ColorArray ColorArray.rgb(int i, int rgb)
      Set the given element of this color array from the given packed RGB representation.
      ColorArray ColorArray.rgb(int i, int red, int green, int blue)
      Set the given element of this color array from the given integer red, green, and blue components.
      Methods in edu.rit.image with parameters of type ColorArray 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ColorArray.copy(ColorArray src, int srcoff, int dstoff, int len)
      Copy a portion of the given color array into this color array.
      void ColorImageQueue.put(int row, ColorArray data)
      Put the given pixel data into the given row of this image queue.
      Constructors in edu.rit.image with parameters of type ColorArray 
      Constructor and Description
      ColorArray(ColorArray array)
      Construct a new color array that is a copy of the given color array.
